title: Screen won't turn on after lock screen + Pixel not recognized by PC after Android 10/11
content:
Hello.
After I updated to Android 10, suddenly my phone starting became buggy.
When I press the power button to lock my smartphone, wait at least 1~2 minute, and suddenly when press again to unlock, the phone stopped working, nothing works: vibration, screen, nothing.
I need to press the button for 30 seconds to reboot my Pixel to continue using my smartphone.

This can be bypassed using a media player running in background. But this will drain the battery.
I wait for Android 11 to see if everything is going to be fixed, but sadly, another problems came out.
My Pixel 2 XL cannot be recognized by Windows after I updated to Android 11, so, I cannot rollback to Android 9.0
